dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://www.paul-simon.info/PHP/showarticle.php?id=188&about=Paul%C2%A0Simon

**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:
From: 	[private] <[private]@musicbox-online.com>
To: 	[private]@google.com
Date: 	Tue, 16 Oct 2007 09:57:55 -0500
Local: 	Tues, Oct 16 2007 7:57 am
Subject: 	DMCA Complaint 52.0
October 16, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
Fax: [private]

Re: Plagiarized/Copyright Content Theft

To whom it may concern:

I am writing to file a charge that paul-simon.info is in violation of
U.S. copyright laws. Our signature is on file with Google.

Search Query: "[private]" site: www.paul-simon.info

Please note that there are other queries that generate this result.


The infringing article can be found at both of these locations:

http://www.paul-simon.info/PHP/showarticle.php?id=188&about=Paul%C2%A0Simon

http://www.paul-simon.info/PHP/showthread.php?thread=3355


The copyrighted work at issue was published at:

http://www.musicbox-online.com/reviews-2007/paulsimon-surprise.html


The posting of this material infringes upon the copyright held by me and
my company The Music Box. I may be contacted at the email address and
phone number listed below.


paul-simon.info can be reached at:

Admin Name: [private]
Admin Organization:
Admin Street1:[private]
Admin City:[private]
Admin State/Province:Tyrol
Admin Postal Code:[private]
Admin Country:AT
Admin Phone:+[private]
Admin Phone Ext.:[private]
Admin FAX:
Admin FAX Ext.:
Admin Email:[private]@gmx.net


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private]
Editor, The Music Box
[private]@musicbox-online.com
[private]
